body: While other tricksters work with subterfuge, you take a more direct approach. 1st-Tier Path Abilities—deadly dodge, defensive move, master of escape, treacherous critical; 3rd-Tier Abilities—fickle attack, mirror dodge; 6th-Tier Abilities—precision critical, slayer's cyclone.
